issue.title: [R] Bindings for grepl
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12141](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12141). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Depends on ARROW-12134. There's `match_substring_regex` and `match_substring` for the `fixed = TRUE` version. Also map to `stringr::str_detect` as appropriate.

comments.body:
